de.weltraumschaf.juberblog

Class Headline

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.weltraumschaf.juberblog.Headline

  • public final class Headline
extends Object
    Parses the first headline of a given Markdown string.
    Author:
    Sven Strittmatter

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static char HEADLINE_TOKEN
      Markdown head lines start with this character.

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String find(String markdown)
      Finds the first headline in a Markdown string.
      (package private) String trim(String line)
      Removes the HEADLINE_TOKEN from beginning of string and removes leading and trailing white spaces.
